SELECT detail_company_order.user_company as top_sales_user_company , sum(detail_company_order.sales_price) as top_sales_price FROM ( SELECT company_order.* , (product.pro_price * company_order.order_qty) as sales_price FROM ( SELECT userinfo.user_company , orders.order_no , orders.pro_no , order_qty , order_date FROM tb_order orders JOIN tb_userinfo userinfo ON orders.loginID = userinfo.loginID
AND orders.order_cd = 'complete' AND order_date
BETWEEN DATE(#{fromDate}) AND DATE(#{toDate})+1
) company_order LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product product ON company_order.pro_no = product.pro_no ) detail_company_order GROUP BY detail_company_order.user_company ORDER BY top_sales_price desc LIMIT 0, 10
